backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with audit logging types, access control mixin, user and controller state maps, and graph-related data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-written summaries for various frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, role checks, dashboard switching, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when the user lacks access, with login, role guidance, principal copy, and ICP panels.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays a detailed dialog of an audit log entry with formatted timestamps, severity indicators, and contextual descriptions.
Shows the user’s authentication status, principal ID, and backend connectivity state with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Allows configuring external security event broadcasting, including enabling/disabling and setting an endpoint URL.
Provides a file-based code editor with category switching, unsaved change handling, and applying or resetting modifications.
frontend/src/components/DashboardViewSwi: Renders buttons to switch between security and ICP operations dashboard views based on permissions.
Explains deployment steps and links to the Caffeine platform for publishing the application.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with authentication controls, theme toggle, role-based titles, and optional view switching.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP backend connection status, network details, canister ID, and retry/error handling.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Provides UI to grant and revoke ICP Controller roles, including form inputs, listing controllers, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: Shows a searchable, categorized list of ICP controls with import/export, reset, and update functionality.
Renders a single ICP control row with the appropriate input widget based on control type.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and introduces the ICP Controls catalog with a header and navigation anchor.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: UI panel explaining ICP mainnet deployment, prerequisites, and step-by-step commands for deploying canisters.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMapCanvas: Interactive canvas that renders nodes and edges, supports zooming, panning, dragging, and theme-based styling.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMapInspec: Inspector panel for viewing and editing a selected node’s label, position, and connected edges with create/delete actions.
Main network map controller handling node CRUD, canvas interaction, inspector display, and canister/graph loading logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Panel showing recent security alerts and flagged users with live-updating indicators and formatted event data.
frontend/src/components/RolesAccessPanel: UI panel showing user and app controller principals, load state, and initialization controls with copy and claim actions.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Administrative terminal component that parses commands, executes registry actions, logs output, and manages command history.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Generates security event statistics from audit logs and displays critical counts, failed logins, and recent activity.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Superuser tools for exporting audit logs, exporting flagged users, and recording export actions with audit entries.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: Form interface to create and submit test audit events with configurable fields for action type, severity, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: UI for flagging, unflagging, and removing users by principal ID, displaying a table of flagged users and associated actions.
frontend/src/components/WebControlQuickT: Provides client‑side tools for copying principal IDs, importing/exporting ICP Controls config, resetting settings, and refreshing connection.
frontend/src/components/WorldWideWebCont: Manages granting and revoking World Wide Web Controller roles, with validation and a table of existing controllers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing and invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs a lightweight backend status check using the target actor and returns connection state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardView.ts: Tracks and persists the selected dashboard view based on permissions and authentication, allowing controlled view switching.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Manages ICP Controls configuration with URL/session precedence, validation, updates, and state synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyNodes.ts: Tracks user-created node IDs per principal using sessionStorage, offering add, remove, clear, and validation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkGraph.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating network graph nodes and edges via a target actor with error‑handled mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for retrieving and updating user profiles, role statuses, and controller information from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useTargetActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and ICP Controls, initializing access control when authenticated.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Utility helpers for control definitions, including lookup, parsing, serialization, validation, and session key generation.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Defines all ICP control categories and control metadata, serving as the central registry for configuration options.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for ICP control categories, control definitions, and option metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and theme variables plus UI overrides for dark mode, components, and scroll behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with security, control, audit, terminal, and management panels.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Displays the ICP operations dashboard with role‑based terminals, controls, network tools, and access panels.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Exports helper functions generating consistent React Query cache keys for multiple ICP-related queries.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the terminal command registry populated from coreCommands.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Implements core terminal commands including help, clear, and security role operations with audit logging and backend interactions.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Defines a restricted set of terminal commands safe for ICP Controllers, including help, clear, and profile management.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Provides audit helpers, error classification, and utility parsers for terminal commands.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Defines terminal command, context, output, and history interfaces.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlAudit.ts: Wraps command execution with best‑effort audit logging and consistent error handling.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlCommandC: Generates large sets of safe, read‑only diagnostic and operational command metadata.
frontend/src/terminal/worldWideWebContro: Registers terminal commands including help, clear, status checks, and catalog‑generated commands.
frontend/src/types/networkGraph.ts: Defines types for nodes, edges, and input structures for editing network graphs.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages file state persistence for the browser code editor using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Utility functions for resolving, validating, and labeling ICP network and canister configuration.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Provides functions to export, download, import, validate, and read ICP Controls configuration JSON files.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project goals, architectural plans, issues, and existing feature entries for the ICP-integrated app.
